name: UMovieSceneAudioSection
doc: Audio section, for use in the audio track, or by attached audio objects

StartFrameOffset: The offset into the beginning of the audio clip
bLooping: Allow looping if the section length is greater than the sound duration
bOverrideAttenuation: Should the attenuation settings on this section be used.

methods.name: GetLooping
methods.doc: @return Whether to allow looping if the section length is greater than the sound duration

methods.name: GetOverrideAttenuation
methods.doc: @return Whether override settings on this section should be used

methods.name: GetSound
methods.doc: Gets the sound for this section

methods.name: GetStartOffset
methods.doc: Get the offset into the beginning of the audio clip

methods.name: SetAttenuationSettings
methods.doc: Set the attenuation settings for this audio section

methods.name: SetLooping
methods.doc: Set whether the sound should be looped

methods.name: SetOverrideAttenuation
methods.doc: Set whether the attentuation should be overriden

methods.name: SetStartOffset
methods.doc: Set the offset into the beginning of the audio clip

methods.name: SetSuppressSubtitles
methods.doc: Set whether subtitles should be suppressed
